EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_MORE Spring Framework 4.0.1 7AM.Reminder 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: Introduction to Spring Framework 4.0.1 on January 23rd
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, We are looking forward to having you join us for the webinar Introduction to Spring Framework 4.0.1 with Juergen Hoeller and the Spring Team. If you haven't done so yet, we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Thursday, January 23, 2014 Europe: 3:00pm GMT (London, GMT) Join the WebEx <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=660434321> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show all global call-in numbers Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 660 434 321
Thank you,
